headline: Southern Co. (SO) Stock Drops Despite Market Gains: Important Facts to Note
summary: Southern Co. (SO) concluded the recent trading session at $88.88, signifying a -0.54% move from its prior day's close.

headline: Walt Farrell Named President and Chief Executive Officer of Atlanta Gas Light and Chattanooga Gas
summary: Southern Company Gas today announced that Walt Farrell has been named president and chief executive officer of Atlanta Gas Light and Chattanooga Gas, effective March 31. In this role, Farrell will serve on the Southern Company Gas Management Council and oversee all aspects of the company's southern operations, bringing clean, safe, reliable and affordable natural gas to approximately 1.8 million customers in Georgia and Tennessee.

headline: Southern Company: A Hedge Against The Market Which Is Now Just An Income Play (Rating Downgrade)
summary: Southern Company faces risks from rising interest rates and renewable energy competition. Read why I am downgrading my investment thesis on SO stock to neutral.
